name: Fireblast
desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

name: Bristleback
desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

name: Death Pulse
desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for 7 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

name: Spectral Dagger
desc: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

name: Macropyre
desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Viscous Nasal Goo
desc: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Dispersion
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

name: Earthshock
desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

name: Leech Seed
desc: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 7 times.

name: Electric Vortex
desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
